ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will validate the facility on product should match with facility selected on Healthcare record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.Data_Migration_Check__c.Bypass_Flow_Validations__c = FALSE && ISBLANK(Source_System_ID__c) && NOT( ISBLANK( Facility__c ) ) && ISPICKVAL( Service_Provided_by_Facility__r.Family ,"Specific" ) && Facility__c <> Service_Provided_by_Facility__r.Account__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Facility does not provide the selected Service. Please select the correct Facility or Service provided by Facility.
